metadata.name: 0xNeko
metadata.description: Neko Cats teleporting from 1989 to 2023. Inspired by Neko Cat application 1989, the 0xNeko is an experimental, interactive, CC-0 licensed and open-source NFT collection (Ordinals) hosted on the Bitcoin blockchain. Initially started as Ethereum collection by @elonsdev in 2022, and optimized for Bitcoin Ordinals by wgw.eth in 2023.
